src_original: parīttā saṃjñā katamā /  yayā kāmadhātuṃ saṃjānāti //
mahagdatā saṃjñā katamā /  yayā rūpadhātuṃ saṃjānāti //
apramāṇasaṃjñā katamā /  yayā ākāśāna ntyāyatanaṃ vijñānānantyāyatanaṃ saṃjānāti //  akiñcana saṃjñā katamā /
vyañjanakāyāḥ katameḥ tadubhayāśrayeṣvakṣareṣu vyañjanakāyā iti prajñaptiḥ /
varṇo 'pi saḥ /  arthasaṃvarṇanatāmupādāya /  akṣare punaḥ paryāyākṣaraṇatāmupādāya //  pṛthagjanatvaṃ katamat /
